field.name: description
field.value:
Starting at revision 3890 access modifier checks started appearing in the code of BaseProxyGenerator.GenerateConstructors method. The original access modifier check just tested to make sure that a constructor was not private. The checks changed to Public, IsFamily, and IsAssembly with InernalVisibleTo. This check will fail for constrcutors marked as protected internal because IsFamily == false. A check must be added for IsFamilyOrAssembly which protected internal equates to.
All classes with protected internal constructors that were previously proxied no longer can be created properly as proxies.
